item.title: By: Nicklaus Ziems
item.dc:creator: Nicklaus Ziems
item.description: The Atomic is one of the best decentralized wallets on the market. It had been since the beginning. It is also the truth to the block chain. I have the Ultimate Trust in the Atomic Wallet's block chain data base. These corrupted financial institutions or so called "Banks." Should realize that they will be cought by the integrity blockchains data base. I have no worries about my investments. Your Etheremon King, Zanic Klaus
item.content:encoded:
The Atomic is one of the best decentralized wallets on the market. It had been since the beginning. It is also the truth to the block chain. I have the Ultimate Trust in the Atomic Wallet’s block chain data base. These corrupted financial institutions or so called “Banks.” Should realize that they will be cought by the integrity blockchains data base. I have no worries about my investments.
Your Etheremon King,
Zanic Klaus

item.title: By: Igwetoo
item.dc:creator: Igwetoo
item.description: The best knowledge I have gain over cryptocurrency is by the use of Atomic Wallet. I so much appreciate the team for the good work.
